name: Jolly Bounce
description:
Art and code made by me (originally in 72 hours), ( https://twitter.com/WildBearArtist )

Music by Emma Andersson. ( https://twitter.com/cadaverosa )

Controls A and D for movement, W for power-up, R for restart.


Update 1.1.3 (13.12)

  • Added power-up system
  • Added sound effects
  • Added snow

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed camera bugs
  • Fixed tile spawning bugs (mostly)
